t: She got married to my bestfriend.
c:
#continuity_by_sd

Here's the first #shortstory challenge. A simple 3 line story where I have written 2 lines already as a collab prompt. Add the 3rd line. 

Notice the conflict hidden in these two lines. The reader is left curious as to why one person is happy, one is not. Collab and write the third line to resolve the story. Make sure the resolution is satisfying and original. It should answer the why of the situation, not the what and how. 
#heartbreak
#YoStoWriMo #Day1Story #3linestory #shewashappyiwasnot #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba
